text: What is the one-line purpose of this feature?
Make it easy for PMs to run an interactive PRD authoring session locally.
Who is the primary user persona for this PRD?
Product Managers who need auditable, local PRDs.
Should the tool attempt to create a PR, or only write the PRD file?
Only write the PRD file by default; PR creation is opt-in.
